name: Solitaire Bot
description: A simple and neutral WhatsApp bot, personalized by Solitaire

ALIVE_IMG.description: Image shown when the bot is alive.

ALIVE_MSG.description: Message shown when the bot is online.
ALIVE_MSG.value: I'm now connected to you âš¡

MODE.description: Choose bot mode: public, private, inbox, group.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Set true if you want auto voice replies.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Set true if you want auto replies.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Set true if you want images automatically converted to stickers.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Set true if you want the bot to auto-read WhatsApp statuses.

ANTI_LINK.description: Set true if you want the bot to remove group links automatically.

ANTI_BAD.description: Set true if you want the bot to auto-delete bad words.

FAKE_RECORDING.description: Set true if you want the bot to fake recording status.

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true if you want auto emoji reactions.

OWNER_REACT.description: Set true if you want bot to react only to the owner.

HEART_REACT.description: Set true if you want only heart emoji reactions.

SIGNATURE.description: Signature added to every bot message.
